item.title: Setting Up Mezzanine Projects in AWS
item.description: Go to EC2 management console, Security groups and add a Custom TCP inbound rule with port 8000. Select “Anywhere” from the list. Then follow [this to install Mezzanine]({% post_url 2015-05-01-how-to-install-mezzanine-on-ubuntulinux-mint %}) Above tutorial is also explains setting up a site record. Mezzanine default site record is 127.0.0.1:8000 which should be 0.0.0.0:8000 in our case. So, enter 0.0.0.0:8000 when you’re asked to enter a site record when you ru python manage.py createdb Also, you might still need to provide this site record while running the development server:
